articles.description: The Mission: Impossible star, known for his love of stunts, wowed the Stade de France.

articles.description: Team GB beat their Tokyo medal tally but only finished seventh in the medal table. Success or backwards step - what do the stats say?
articles.title: Paris 2024: Team GB Olympic medal winners - the stats

articles.description: From an unexpected swimmer at La Defense Arena to a casual Turkish shooter, here is a look at 10 viral moments from the Paris Olympics.

articles.description: England captain Ben Stokes is carried off the field after sustaining an apparent hamstring injury when playing for the Northern Superchargers in The Hundred.
articles.title: England cricket: Test captain Ben Stokes injured in Hundred match

articles.description: The United States snatch top spot in the 2024 Olympic medal table as their women's basketball team beat hosts France to win the final gold on offer in Paris.

articles.description: Imane Khelif and Lin Yu-ting each won gold in boxing at Paris 2024 - but the row over their eligibility looks set to continue.
articles.title: Imane Khelif and Lin Yu-ting: Boxing eligibility row key questions

articles.description: American gymnast Jordan Chiles has been stripped of the bronze medal she won in the women's floor final after a ruling by the Court of Arbitration for Sport.
articles.title: Jordan Chiles: Gymnast loses Olympic bronze in score dispute

articles.description: Liverpool beat Sevilla and Arsenal win against Lyon, while Chelsea draw with Inter Milan in pre-season friendlies.
